title: Check HOA Documents for Buyer
description: A buyer is considering a condo and the agent needs to review the HOA documents for potential red flags.

tasks.description: Request and receive the complete HOA document package from the listing agent or HOA management company.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent obtains all HOA docs, including budget, bylaws, and meeting minutes.

tasks.description: Analyze the HOA's financial health by reviewing the budget and reserve study.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies if the HOA is well-funded or if a special assessment is likely.

tasks.description: Summarize key findings for the buyer, including any rental restrictions, pending litigation, or major upcoming projects.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear and concise summary to help the buyer make an informed decision.
